trends: There has been one other sighting in Garwood
There was one other sighting in Garwood on or around November 11th 2002
Summary: White, cylindrical object in daytime sky
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife took the picture from our yard in Garwood, Texas on Nov 11, 2002 at637pm.She heard, then noticed, an airliner overhead were in some flight paths forHouston airports and looked up. The airliner and this object were fairly highin the sky, but the airliner moved out of her field of view. By the time shegot the camera, the object was even further away, but still visible when shetook the photo digital.She described it as looking like a rocket, but with no fins or wings. It wascylindrical in shape, white with a red stripe around the center. She continuedto wonder about its appearance, particularly the no fins. Also, it appeared tobe blunt on both ends.
